power.title: Blade in the Back
power.fluff: You step into your foe's shadow and instantly appear behind it, giving it no time to readjust

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have the shadow step Assassin class power.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Before resolving the attack, you teleport up to 3 squares to another space adjacent to the target.
You count as also being in the space you occupied, possibly allowing you to flank the target with yourself for this attack.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, plus additional damage equal to your number of shrouds on the target if you have combat advantage against it.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, plus additional damage equal to twice your number of shrounds on the target if you have combat advantage against it.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you flank the target, it takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to 2 + your Dexterity modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Executioner's Noose
power.fluff: You gather shadows in the form of a noose, cast it around your foe's neck, and pull

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Dexterity modifier force damage, and you pull the target a number of squares equal to your number of shrouds on it.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier force damage.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: You can knock the target prone. The target can attempt a saving throw to avoid being knocked prone.
The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You pull the target half the distance.

power.title: Frightful Flickers
power.fluff: You cause shadowy flickers to cover your victim's eyes, causing it to panic when it can't see clearly

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Will
If you have concealment from the target or it is unaware of your presence, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your number of shrouds on it

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a penalty to triggered attack rolls until the end of your next turn. The penalty equals 2 + one-half your number of shrouds on it.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d8 + Dexterity modidifer psychic damage.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target also takes the penalty to all attack rolls for the first non-triggered attack it makes before the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you have concealment from the target or it is unaware of your presence, it takes one-half the penalty to triggered attack rolls.

power.title: Inescapable Blade
power.fluff: You stop several feet away from you foe and slash with your weapon, and your weapon's shadow closes the distance, not slowed down by physical obstacles

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC
If the target has at least two of your shrouds on it, you increase the reach by an additional +1, or by an additional +2 if the target has four of your shrouds on it
This attack ignores cover and superior cover

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2[W] damage.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can use this power in place of a melee basic attack when making a reactive strike. This does not allow you to trigger reactive strikes against creatures that aren't adjacent to you unless you normally could do so.

power.title: Lashing Shrouds
power.fluff: You direct your shrouds outward from the foe they cover, lashing at the life force of another

section.text: Using this power provokes reactive strikes as if you had used a ranged attack

section.name: Attack:
section.range: 2, using the creature your shrouds are on as the point of origin
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex
If you have at least 3 of your shrouds on the creature used as the point of origin, you can target two creatures

section.name: Hit:
section.text: Necrotic damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus + your number of shrouds on the creature used as the point of origin.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to 2 + your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus + your number of shrouds.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to 2 + your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus + twice your number of shrouds on the creature used as the point of origin.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Shadow Storm
power.fluff: Your tie to the Shadowfell call on the living shadows around your foe, causing them to claw at it at your beck and call

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex
You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your number of shrouds on the target

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d4 + Dexterity modifier damage, plus 1 damage for each creature adjacent to the target.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d4 + Dexterity modifier damage, plus 2 damage for each creature adjacent to the target.

section.name: Special:
section.text: This power counts as a basic attack.

power.title: Shard of Darkness
power.fluff: You swing your weapon and a shard of darkness in crude replication of it shoots towards your foe

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a melee weapon.

section.name: Attack:
section.range2: weapon +2/+4 if your weapon can be thrown
section.target: one creature you have your shrouds on
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier force damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier force damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

power.title: Twisting Shades
power.fluff: As your weapon makes contact, the shrouds you have placed on your victim twist tighter, digging cruelly to its flesh

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
If you didn't invoke your shrouds on the target, it takes additional damage equal to your number of shrouds on it.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, additional damage equals twice your number of shrouds.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If your shrouds are on the target and you didn't invoke them, you deal damage to the target equal to your number of shrouds on it + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to twice your number of shrouds + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
